name: Fitia
headline: Automated Meal Planner & Nutrition Tracking
description: Fitia is an automated meal planner and nutrition tracker for weight loss or muscle gain. Our users get personalized recipes based on their data and their local country ingredients, supported with an exclusive database of 1M foods & recipes.

founders.name: Piero Linares, Founder
founders.description: Piero has corporate experience in Business Development and M&A, with more than US$1.2 billion in executed investments. In addition to his corporate role, Piero has been passionate about nutrition and fitness research since the age of 17, which was one of the triggers for founding Fitia.

# Lose or Gain Weight with a Smart Diet
Smart nutrition plans to lose fat ğŸ”¥ or gain muscle ğŸ’ª

ğŸŒ¯ +8,000 personalized recipes... and more!

App StorePlay Store
![Lose or Gain Weight with a Smart Diet](https://fitia.app/_vercel/image?url=%2Fimg%2Fhome%2Fen%2Fmockup_plan.webp&w=640&q=100)
## How do we do it?
![How do we do it?](https://fitia.app/_vercel/image?url=%2Fimg%2Fhome%2Fen%2Falgo_desktop.webp&w=1536&q=100)![How do we do it?](https://fitia.app/_vercel/image?url=%2Fimg%2Fhome%2Fen%2Falgo_mobile.webp&w=1536&q=100)
![](https://fitia.app/)
## Food based on your preferences
Fitia will only build meals with the foods you select
![Food based on your preferences](https://fitia.app/_vercel/image?url=%2Fimg%2Fhome%2Fen%2Fmockup_foods.webp&w=640&q=100)
![Simple & Easy](https://fitia.app/_vercel/image?url=%2Fimg%2Fhome%2Fen%2Fmockup_recipes.webp&w=640&q=100)
![](https://fitia.app/)
## Simple & Easy
More than 8,000 recipes to reach your goal, based on your foods and time available
![](https://fitia.app/_nuxt/landing_brands.N4QjOFpm.webp)
## Find your local brands
Track your calories and macros with our database of over 500,000 products. Legitimate information verified by nutritionists
![Find your local brands](https://fitia.app/_vercel/image?url=%2Fimg%2Fhome%2Fen%2Fmockup_scan_metric.webp&w=640&q=100)
![Save time and money](https://fitia.app/_vercel/image?url=%2Fimg%2Fhome%2Fen%2Fmockup_shoppinglist_metric.webp&w=640&q=100)
![](https://fitia.app/)
## Save time and money
Our automatic shopping list calculates the exact amount of food you need to buy
![](https://fitia.app/)
## Increase your motivation
Join a group that shares your interests (gym, fasting, vegetarian diet, etc.).
![Increase your motivation](https://fitia.app/_vercel/image?url=%2Fimg%2Fhome%2Fen%2Fmockup_teams.webp&w=640&q=100)
## More benefits
![](https://fitia.app/)
## Track your nutrition
With our calorie counter, you will be able to control your calories, proteins, fats and carbohydrates
![](https://fitia.app/)
## Scan and track
Scan the barcode of any product and find out its nutrition facts
![](https://fitia.app/)
## Easy and simple meals
If you don't have time to cook, you can choose the simple food option or use the time filter for quick recipes
![](https://fitia.app/)
## Variety
With more than 8,000 recipes to suit your needs. Servings and ingredients are automatically adjusted
![](https://fitia.app/)
## Flexible eating
If you can't follow the meal plan, no problem. Log any food from our database
![](https://fitia.app/)
## Highly Customizable
Change the number of meals, calories, macronutrients, foods. Everything
![](https://fitia.app/)
## Keto, High Protein...
You can choose macro distributions pre-defined by Fitia and forget about the calculations
![](https://fitia.app/)
## Stay Hydrated
Fitia calculates your recommended water intake. Stick to it with our water reminders
![](https://fitia.app/)
## Vegan, Gluten Free, Pescetarian...
Fitia adjusts to any dietary regimen based on your selected foods
![](https://fitia.app/)
## Calculate and improve your fat %
With simple measurements, Fitia can calculate your fat %. Monitor it as you follow the plan

generated_description:
**Fitia: Your Smart Meal Pal**

Founded in 2019 and based in Lima, Peru, Fitia is on a mission to simplify nutrition with an automated meal planner and nutrition tracker designed for weight loss and muscle gain. Imagine having your own personal chef that understands your dietary preferences, local ingredients, and nutritional needsâ€”all catered to you.

### What They Offer
Fitia harnesses the power of technology to provide users with personalized meal plans and recipes. Their unique algorithm takes you through a simple process where you can select your preferred foods and dietary restrictions, ensuring every meal aligns with your goals. With a database boasting over **1 million food items and recipes**, they offer more than **8,000 personalized recipes** to help you eat smartly and efficiently.

### Features to Enjoy
- **Calorie and Macro Tracking:** Keep an eye on your nutritional intake effortlessly.
- **Customized Meal Plans:** Based on your preferences, including local ingredients.
- **Shopping List Generation:** It even tells you exactly how much you need to buy.
- **Diet Flexibility:** Whether you're on a keto, vegan, or pescetarian diet, Fitia adapts to your lifestyle.
- **Motivation and Community:** Join groups of like-minded individuals who share similar food or fitness interests.

### Team & Mentorship
With a committed team of 19 and mentorship from Y Combinator Group Partner Michael Seibel, Fitia is forging its path in the fitness and health tech scene. They've tagged themselves as part of the â€œconsumer, fitness, health & wellnessâ€ marketsâ€”areas poised for substantial growth.

### In Numbers
- Founded: 2019
- Employees: 19 
- Y Combinator Batch: S21
- Countries Available: Multiple, including Peru, the U.S., Canada, and more.
- User Reviews: Over **121,038 reviews** show a solid community satisfaction.

### Why Fitia Matters
In a world where food choices can be overwhelming, Fitia cuts through the noise, serving up personalized plans that fit directly into your lifestyle. Itâ€™s not just about eating; itâ€™s about eating smart. If youâ€™re looking to lose weight or gain muscle, Fitia might just be your new best friend.

If youâ€™re ready to take back control of your nutrition with ease and smart tech, check out [Fitia](https://fitia.app/) and start your journey today!
